Key Match Events: Babar Hayat laid down the platform with the bat
Ravindra Jadeja claimed the wicket of Babar Hayat
India's power-hitting towards the end set up the victory
India's bowlers did a near clinical job of defending the big total
Post-Match Reflections: Suryakumar Yadav said that some of his shots are predetermined but most of the time, you have to bat in the present
Suryakumar Yadav added that the pitch was on the slower side and he wanted to express himself and up the tempo of the innings
Miscellaneous Highlights: India beat Hong Kong by 40 runs to qualify for Super Fours
Hong Kong's inability to pick up regular wickets cost them at the death
India dominated at the Dubai International Cricket Stadium
